Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Although the non-fullerene PSC exhibits a lower PCE than the PC71BM - based device , the promising photovoltaic performance over 4% PCE with decent photovoltaic parameters ( V OC , J SC and FF ) suggests that PTATDPP can be used as a universal donor material compatible with various electron acceptors for high performance PSCs .

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSC |
| PC71BM |
| PTATDPP |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions.
